We have mades some changes on the news/single news page. Let me know if this works for you? 
https://www.msaustralia.org.au/news/

Hi Joel

Just looping back to the issue with the related articles - Is this something that you are working on? If not please can you add it to the list.

If you require further information please contact Sophie or Jess who can explain the issue in more detail.

Thank you

Trish

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath


Thank you so much for addressing the issues we have raised today.


Currently emailing about the News section of the website.


When I scroll through and add more pages and then keep adding more. If I open up a news item and then hit back - it takes me back to the very beginning of the news landing page not where I was at. Is there a way I don't get sent back to the very first page .


I also know it's the page style to add more and then keep adding more but I find this really hard to scroll through, especially when I am looking for something that is old. Is there a way to improve this functionality as currently it's very hard to use for old content.


Additionally we have tested the news section on mobile and please see the below screenshot. Please can this be fixed so it's more mobile friendly.






Additionally I have noticed that when I do a search and the AMSLS comes up it has a lot of script that is displayed.


AMSLS Overview:


Lastly
I know we have added services and support https://www.msaustralia.org.au/supports-and-services/ onto the boxes on the home page but it has been requested that we also add it into the menu item. Please can you add it into the menu bar "For People with MS"


Thank you so much again for your assistance

Kindest regards
Trish

Petricia Augustus​
